name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 27, a job appointment and removal notice from the Shifang Municipal Government showed that Yang Yongjun was promoted to vice principal of Shifang Middle School.
At the end of November 2022, a recording of Shifang Middle School was leaked. At that time, Yang Yongjun read out secret documents from the central government and Sichuan Province at a meeting, announcing that Shifang Middle School would organize and implement a group immunity experiment, which caused great panic among parents and students.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 31, in Wenzhou, Zhejiang, a car owner was driving a NIO car when the vehicle suddenly lost control and crashed into a small car on the roadside. The airbag did not deploy throughout the process.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 2 (Released) Chongqing. A woman reported Zhou Siying, a deputy director of the Civil Affairs Bureau, for abusing his power to commit corruption, hiding more than 1 billion yuan of assets under his parents' names, and helping her husband to obtain fake military officer certificates and ID cards to evade legal responsibility.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: He Jiankui, who was sentenced to three years in prison for the "gene-edited baby case", was recently reported to have regained investment to set up a laboratory and recruit graduates. He said, "Gene weapons will be the core weapon of the next world war. If human genes are edited, it will not be a problem to create the Hulk or Captain America."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the eve of the start of the new school term in schools across the country, the magazine "Qiushi" sponsored by the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China published an article by President Xi Jinping, which stated: We must never cultivate people who have Chinese faces but not Chinese hearts, no Chinese feelings, and lack Chinese flavor.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 1, Shenyang, Liaoning. After an old man asked to give up his seat on the subway to no avail, he scolded the students, "I don't have to pay for the ride. You are the trash of society. Without us, the older generation, how would you be where you are today?"
